Original: Your client this time is the lady
sitting over there, filled with
a terrible anxiety.
[Page]
You must get the details of the
request from her. I shall await
your swift return...
Translation: Your client this time is the lady
sitting over there, filled with
a terrible anxiety.
[Page]
You must get the details of the
request from her. I shall await
your swift return...

Original: I am very glad to hear that you found
the woman's brother. Your guild is
truly a savior to those in need.
[Page]
Though this request has reminded me
again of the danger you face... Make
sure you take every precaution.
[Page]
Here is the reward the boy's sister
left for you. Well done...
Translation: I am very glad to hear that you found
the woman's brother. Your guild is
truly a savior to those in need.
[Page]
Though this request has reminded me
again of the danger you face... Make
sure you take every precaution.
[Page]
Here is the reward the boy's sister
left for you. Well done...

Original: As you search for the missing
explorer, you hear a man's cry
through the roaring of the winds.
[Page]
"Heyyyy! You up there! Pretty weird
that we'd find each other like this,
isn't it!?"
[Page]
When you look over the edge of your
gondola, you see a wrecked skyship
and a young man waving to you.
Translation: As you search for the missing
explorer, you hear a man's cry
through the roaring of the winds.
[Page]
"Heyyyy! You up there! Pretty weird
that we'd find each other like this,
isn't it!?"
[Page]
When you look over the edge of your
gondola, you see a wrecked skyship
and a young man waving to you.

Original: "My name's [Color:5]Raht[Color:0]! I was attacked by
monsters, and, well, you can guess
the rest! Pretty sorry, huh?"
Translation: "My name's [Color:5]Raht[Color:0]! I was attacked by
monsters, and, well, you can guess
the rest! Pretty sorry, huh?"

Original: You recognize that name "Raht" as
the client's brother... he is the
explorer you seek!
[Page]
However, he seems to be injured and
cannot walk. To attempt to move him
would be very dangerous.
[Page]
All you can do for the boy is to
hurry back and report his location
to your client.
Translation: You recognize that name "Raht" as
the client's brother... he is the
explorer you seek!
[Page]
However, he seems to be injured and
cannot walk. To attempt to move him
would be very dangerous.
[Page]
All you can do for the boy is to
hurry back and report his location
to your client.

Original: You can see Raht desperately waving
to you! Hurry back and report in to
your client!
Translation: You can see Raht desperately waving
to you! Hurry back and report in to
your client!
